6256d43cb0590.Name: LLP012 List addresses to select from
6256d43cb0590.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59dc224eb4f63","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) as display
	   ,uprn as name
  FROM (SELECT sao
  			  ,pao
  			  ,street_name
  			  ,town_name
  			  ,uprn
          FROM llpgcache 
         WHERE length(REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))>5
           AND postcode != ''
           AND (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,' ',postcode) like concat('%',REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ','%'),'%'))) tmp
ORDER BY CAST(pao AS SIGNED),sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 300","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

6262d0ae0f491.Name: GPR041 - list of Preferred method of contact
6262d0ae0f491.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59dc224eb4f63","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT *
FROM (
SELECT 'phone' as display
		,1 as name
		,'dTe' as fltr
		,'dCi' as fltr2
		,'zz' as exc
UNION ALL
SELECT 'mobile' as display
		,2 as name
		,'dMo' as fltr
		,'dCi' as fltr2
		,'zz' as exc
UNION ALL
SELECT 'email' as display
		,3 as name
		,'dEm' as fltr
		,'dCi' as fltr2
		,'zz' as exc
UNION ALL
SELECT 'post' as display
		,4 as name
		,'dAd' as fltr
		,'zz' as fltr2
		,'pcNa' as exc
) lst
WHERE {subParam} not like BINARY concat('%', lst.exc, '%')
  AND ({subParam} like BINARY concat('%', lst.fltr, '%')
  		OR {subParam} like BINARY concat('%', lst.fltr2, '%'))","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

6256e25cdaee2.Name: LLP013 Selected value to fields inc text area address
6256e25cdaee2.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59dc224eb4f63","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT a.*
		,if(substring(a.test,1,1)='1',flat_out
									 ,if(substring(a.test,1,1)='2',house_out
																  ,if(substring(a.test,1,1)='3',street_out
																							   ,if(substring(a.test,1,1)='4',town_out,'')))) as textOut1
		,if(substring(a.test,2,1)='2',house_out
									 ,if(substring(a.test,2,1)='3',street_out
																  ,if(substring(a.test,2,1)='4',town_out,''))) as textOut2
		,if(substring(a.test,3,1)='3',street_out
									 ,if(substring(a.test,3,1)='4',town_out,'')) as textOut3
		,if(substring(a.test,4,1)='4',town_out,'') as textOut4
		,a.test as available
		,concat(if(flat_out != '', concat(flat_out,', '), ''),
				if(house_out != '', concat(house_out,', '), ''),
				if(street_out != '', concat(street_out,', '), ''),
				if(town_out != '', concat(town_out,', '), ''),
				postcode_out5) as AddrConcat
		,concat(flat_out, if(length(flat_out) > 3, '\n', if(flat_out != '', ' ', '')), 
				house_out, if(length(house_out) > 3, '\n', if(house_out != '', ' ', '')), 
				if(street_out != '', concat(street_out,'\n'), ''),
				if(town_out != '', concat(town_out,'\n'), ''),
				postcode_out5) as AdTextArea_out
FROM (SELECT sao as flat_out,
			 pao as house_out,
			 street_name as street_out,
			 town_name as town_out, 
			 postcode as postcode_out5,
			 uprn as uprn_out,
			 lng as lng_out,
			 lat as lat_out,
			 {Choose_Address} as uprn_selected,
			 CONCAT(if(length(sao)>0,1,'')
					,if(length(pao)>0,2,'')
					,if(length(street_name)>0,3,'')
					,if(length(town_name)>0,4,'')) as test
	    FROM llpgcache
WHERE uprn = {Choose_Address}) a","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

58ca9f8575eb5.Name: PRO010 Load Profile info to SFG Cust Details
58ca9f8575eb5.Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","secure_fields_db_database":"","results_page_columns_db":"","escapeTokens":"yes","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"select * From
(select
	1 as IDZZ,
	1 as existSelected,
	1 as existingCustomer,
	{Organisation_Name} as Organisation_Name_out,
	{Title} as Title_out,
	{First_Name} as First_Name_out,
	{Surname} as Surname_out,
	{flat} as flat_out,
	{house} as house_out,
	{street} as street_out,
	{town} as town_out, 
	if({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom','',{postcode}) as postcode_out5,
	if({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom',{postcode},'') as zIPPostcode,
	{country} as country_out,
	{country_id} as sel_country,
	{uprn} as uprn_out,
	{lng} as lng_out,
	{lat} as lat_out,
	{Date_of_Birth} as Date_of_Birth_out,
	{Email_Address} as Email_Address_out,
	{Mobile_Number} as Mobile_Number_out,
	{Phone_Number} as Phone_Number_out,
	'ProAi' as haveRun
union select
	2 as IDZZ,
	'' as existSelected,
	'' as existingCustomer,
	{Organisation_Name} as Organisation_Name_out,
	{Title} as Title_out,
	{First_Name} as First_Name_out,
	{Surname} as Surname_out,
	'' as flat_out,
	'' as house_out,
	'' as street_out,
	'' as town_out, 
	'' as postcode_out5,
	'' as zIPPostcode,
	'' as country_out,
	'' as sel_country,
	'' as uprn_out,
	'' as lng_out,
	'' as lat_out,
	{Date_of_Birth} as Date_of_Birth_out,
	{Email_Address} as Email_Address_out,
	{Mobile_Number} as Mobile_Number_out,
	{Phone_Number} as Phone_Number_out,
	'ProAe' as haveRun) Combine
Where
	IDZZ = (select if({subParm} like '%dA%' 
			and {subParm} not like '%oNA%'
			and {postcode} is not null ,1,2) as test)","systemID":"59dc224eb4f63"}

6262afe3906c5.Name: LLP029 Change to Use Customer Recorded
6262afe3906c5.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59dc224eb4f63","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"Select Comb.*
		,if(substring(Comb.test,1,1)='1',flat_out
			,if(substring(Comb.test,1,1)='2',house_out
				,if(substring(Comb.test,1,1)='3',street_out
					,if(substring(Comb.test,1,1)='4',town_out,'')))) as textOut1
		,if(substring(Comb.test,2,1)='2',house_out
			,if(substring(Comb.test,2,1)='3',street_out
				,if(substring(Comb.test,2,1)='4',town_out,''))) as textOut2
		,if(substring(Comb.test,3,1)='3',street_out
			,if(substring(Comb.test,3,1)='4',town_out,'')) as textOut3
		,if(substring(Comb.test,4,1)='4',town_out,'') as textOut4
		,Comb.test as available
From
(select
	{flat} as flat_out,
	{house} as house_out,
	{street} as street_out,
	{town} as town_out, 
	IF({country} IS NULL or {country} = '' or {country} = 'United Kingdom', {postcode}, '') as postcode_out5,
	IF({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom', {postcode}, '') as zIPPostcode,
	{country} as country_out,
	{uprn} as uprn_out,
	{lng} as lng_out,
	{lat} as lat_out,
	'' as existSelected,
	1 as forSelect,
	IF({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%', 1, {existingCustomer}) as existingCustomer,
	CONCAT(if(length({flat})>0,1,'')
			,if(length({house})>0,2,'')
			,if(length({street})>0,3,'')
			,if(length({town})>0,4,'')) as test
	,concat(if({flat} != '', concat({flat},', '), ''),
			if({house} != '', concat({house},', '), ''),
			if({street} != '', concat({street},', '), ''),
			if({town} != '', concat({town},', '), ''),
			{postcode},
			if({country} != '', concat(', ', {country}), '')) as AddrConcat
	,concat({flat}, if(length({flat}) > 3, '\n', if({flat} != '', ' ', '')),
			{house}, if(length({house}) > 3, '\n', if({house} != '', ' ', '')),
			if({street} != '', concat({street},'\n'), ''),
			if({town} != '', concat({town},'\n'), ''),
			{postcode},
			if({country} != '', concat('\n', {country}), '')) as AdTextArea_out
	,'ProcAi' as haveRun
Union select
	'' as flat_out,
	'' as house_out,
	'' as street_out,
	'' as town_out, 
	'' as postcode_out5,
	'' as zIPPostcode,
	'' as country_out,
	'' as uprn_out,
	'' as lng_out,
	'' as lat_out,
	1 as existSelected,
	0 as forSelect,
	'' as existingCustomer,
	'' as test,
	'' as AddrConcat,
	'' as AdTextArea_out,
	'ProcAi' as haveRun) as Comb
Where
	IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), 1, '') = Comb.forSelect","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

631853150b07e.Name: RRM019 - Check for previous missed bin on date

props.label: html 1
props.content:
{#testFormWarn}

If you think your waste collection has been missed, you can let us know by completing this form.


Before you start, please check that:

  • You are sure of the collection day.
  • The waste type (rubbish, recycling, bulky waste or healthcare) is only from a household and contains this type of waste only, as there are some types of waste that we don't collect. You can find more information about this below.
  • If there is a red hanger on your recycling bin, find out what you can recycle at home.

Find out more about rubbish, recycling or other waste collections.


Important notice: all missed collections must be reported within 2 working days of the scheduled collection date. If it is reported later, we will not return.

Please do not report the same missed collection several times as it only duplicates the information and slows down our response time.
